column2: You are jailed. \nThrow two of a kind to be released.
Too many or too few players..
The player name is already taken. Please choose a unique name.
You used your "get out of jail" card
Because all colors are owned, the rent was doubled!
Do you want to restart the game?
You are under arrested! You must pay 1000 $, get two of a kind or use a release card to get released from jail .
You have been imprisoned for three turns. If you can't get two of a kind then you must pay a fine.
I don't want to use my release card.
You have one release card. Would you like to use it?
You didn't get two of kind.
You have 3 tries to get 2 of a kind.
You got two of a kind. You move forward as the dice shows.
You have been imprisoned for three turns and must pay a fine of 1000$. Move according to your next dice roll.
You got two of a kind. You receive an extra turn.
You got two of a kind too many times. You are sent to Jail.
You have paid a fine of 1000$. Now you can throw the dice.
You have used a release card. Now you can throw the dice.
You are on a property without an owner. Would you like to buy this property?
You are on a shipping company without an owner. Would you like to buy this shipping company?
You are on a brewery without an owner. Would you like to buy this brewery?
You landed on a field with an owner and you have to pay to
You landed on a property without an owner, but you cannot afford it.
You have land on a field that you own. Nothing happens.
Do you want to bid on the field? The current bid is
How much do you want to bid?
Oil prices are increased and you have to pay 500$ per a house and 2000$ per a hotel.
Property taxes are increased. Extra expenses are: 800$ per house, $2300 per hotel.
You ran a red light. Pay $1000 for a traffic fine.
Pay for car wash and waxing $300.
Pay $200 for delivery of 2 crates of beer.
You have bought 4 tires for your car. You pay $1000.
You have received a parking ticket. You pay a $200 fine.
You have been abroad and bought too many cigarettes. Pay $200 in import tax.
You have won the lottery. You receive $500.
You receive a stock dividend. You receive $1000 from the bank.
The municipality has refunded this quarters tax. Withdraw $3000 from the bank.
You won money from sports betting, receive $1000.
Due to inflation you get a salary increase. You receive $1000.
Your government bond has matured.You receive $1000 from the bank.
You have sold some old furniture on auction. Receive $1000 from the bank.
You sell somme produce from your kitchen garden. Receive $200 from the bank.
You receive “The Matador-grant” of $40,000, but only if your assets don't exceed $15,000.
It's your birthday! Receive $200 from each of the other players.
You have fronted money for a potluck. Oddly enough everyone pays right away. Receive from $500 each fellow players.
You are holding a family gathering and receive $500 from each of the other players.
Move towards to Frederiksberg Allé. If you pass START then you receive $4000.
Move towards to the closet Shipping company and pay twice the normal rental fee to the owner. If the company doesn't have an owner, then you can purchase it.
Sail with the Mols-Line, Move forward and if you pass START you receive $4000.
Move forwards to Grønningen, if you pass START you receive $4000.
Move forwards to Vimmelskaftet, if you pass START you receive $4000.
Sail with the closet ferry, if you pass START you receive $4000.
Move forwards to Strandvejen. if you pass START you receive $4000.
On the occasion of the king's birthday you are hereby pardoned from prison. This card can be kept until you need it or you can sell it.
Go to Prison, You will not receive $4000 when you pass start.
Choose which street you want build a house or hotel on.
Which property do you want to mortgage?
Which mortgage do you want to pay?
Who would you like to trade with?
Make a trade offer. Currently the deal is:
Hvad vil du byde for de tilbudte aktiver?
How much money will you give? Write negative value, to get money.
- Choose which property you would like to add to the offer. You can also press "Back", if you dont want to add a property.
Would you like to add another property? Currently you have the following properties on offer.
offers the following assets in a trade:
